testcase.name: Backtest Results Display â€º should show backtest results in all sections
testcase.system-out: === Step 1: Navigate to dashboard === [info] %cDownload the React DevTools for a better development experience: https://react.dev/link/react-devtools font-weight:bold [log] [UnifiedWebSocket] Subscribed to channel: signals [log] [UnifiedWebSocket] Subscribed to channel: trades [log] [UnifiedWebSocket] Primary WebSocket connected [debug] [UnifiedWebSocket] No schema for message type: price_update === Step 2: Open backtest panel === [log] [Fast Refresh] rebuilding === Step 3: Select validation dates === === Step 4: Start backtest === [log] [BacktestService] Starting backtest: 2025-01-01 to 2025-06-30 (model=ppo_v20) Clicked Iniciar Backtest Waiting for backtest to complete... [log] [BacktestService] Backtest completed: 132 trades [log] [Dashboard] Backtest completed: 132 trades from 2025-01-01 to 2025-06-30 [log] [Dashboard] Clearing dashboard [log] [Dashboard] Dashboard cleared [log] [Dashboard] Backtest mode activated with 132 trades [log] [Dashboard] Starting animated replay with 5000 bars [debug] [UnifiedWebSocket] No schema for message type: heartbeat [log] [Fast Refresh] done in 31744ms [log] [USDCOP][useIntegratedChart] [2026-01-13T17:57:48.763Z] [DEBUG] Fetched 15017 candlesticks with price movement [log] [USDCOP][useIntegratedChart] [2026-01-13T17:57:50.013Z] [DEBUG] Fetched 15017 candlesticks with price movement [debug] [UnifiedWebSocket] No schema for message type: heartbeat === Step 5: Wait for chart to load === === Step 6: Final verification === === Step 7: Checking sections === Trading Summary heading visible: true REPLAY badge visible: true Trades text found: 132 [log] [Fast Refresh] rebuilding Equity Curve section visible: true Profit/Loss text found: $-4416 Signal markers visible on page: 3 === Test completed ===
